name: list_podcast_episodes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool spotify_scraper.
Tool description: An all-in-one scraper for scraping everything on Spotify, and a highly available download solution for tracks, lyrics and episode previews.
API description: Gets a list of episodes for a given podcast show from the Spotify Scraper API.

showid.description: The unique identifier of the podcast show.

limit.description: The maximum number of items returned per request. Defaults to `100`.

offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set. Defaults to `0`.
